title: Bug 26126[Navigator] NPE in GotoActionGroup
description: I found this in my .log file, using integration build 20021113. It looks likeending a debug session with an installed breakpoint caused the problem:!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.resources 4 2 Nov 13, 2002 10:51:03.426!MESSAGE Problems occurred when invoking code from
